title: How To: Perfect Chicken
description:
For the perfect chicken, using your favorite rub inside and out and smoking at 225°F until the internal temp reaches 160° to 165°, is an ideal way to do that.

Get perfect chicken with these products:

SmokePro DLX Pellet Grill

Be sure and subscribe for more Quick Tips, Recipes, and more.

asset.author: Camp Chef

transcripts: For the perfect chicken every time, put your favorite rub inside and out. Fire up your pellet grill to 225 degrees-- insert the probe. When it's 160 to 165 degrees, your chicken is done.
